entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 02:25 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: E 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
